attributes.action: Terminate the employment of the Chief Executive and Board of the Student Loans Company (SLC)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With 88,000 students still waiting for payment of their student loan, graduates' repayments failing to be credited to accounts, students' documents being repeatedly lost and £331,000 of expenses being claimed on unnecessary first class rail travel, it is clear that the senior management of the Student Loans Company (SLC) are not performing to a satisfactory standard, are not worth their inflated six-figure salaries and should have their employment terminated.
